title: Add dark mode toggle to user settings
body:
## Feature Request

Users have requested the ability to toggle between light and dark mode in the application settings.

### Expected Behavior
- Add a toggle switch in Settings > Appearance
- When toggled, the entire app should switch themes
- User preference should persist across sessions

### Additional Context
- We already have CSS variables for colors
- Should work on both desktop and mobile views
- Consider system preference detection as a stretch goal
